alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:32PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms expected to increase Monday... A brief period of elevated fire weather conditions is possible for Humboldt county Monday. Increasing monsoon moisture coming from central Nevada tonight into Monday morning will increase chances for showers and thunderstorms for the area Monday afternoon. Isolated thunderstorms will initially be dry before a transition to wetting rain cores occurs through the afternoon. Dry lightning is not expected to be widespread. However, very dry fuels exist which could elevate ignition efficiency. Atmospheric moisture including surface relative humidity will increase substantially Monday night into Tuesday along with lower temperatures. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
